title: Capstone Project Domain
content: I wanna take Cloud Computing as my domain for capstone project. Can you rate the difficulty level for this domain? I want easier capstone project so that I can focus mor e on placements. Or Should I just go with AI/ML?

comments.body: Depends on your topic. Discuss topics with your team and your professor. You'll understand the difficulty only after a basic literature survey.
Thanks....is it okay if I approach the professor who I want as a guide now? I haven't formed a team yet
Thanks....is it okay if I approach the professor who I want as a guide now? I haven't formed a team yet
I think you need to approach as a team if I'm not wrong. Atleast that's what most do.
